Configuration.Name: L1=L2=12m_apx7p5mm
Configuration.SetupScript: config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 11200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g3' config.apx = -47 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 93.5717 config.beamcenterz = 95.1442 config.drive()

Scattering.SetupScript: # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41.0, 0) driveBsz(255.5)
